name: Damian Franciszek Pospiech
profile_summary:
Senior Golang Engineer with 13+ years of experience in building high-performance applications, particularly in the healthcare and financial sectors. Proficient in **Golang**, **TypeScript**, **Postgres**, and modern frameworks such as **Vue** and **React**. Extensive expertise in developing and deploying asynchronous workflows and **cloud-native deployments** using **Docker** and **Kubernetes**. Demonstrated success in implementing **REST APIs**, **CI/CD** pipelines, and designing distributed systems to enhance application reliability and efficiency. 
Strong background in leading teams through collaborative programming and mentoring junior developers while ensuring adherence to industry standards. Proven track record of aligning solutions with compliance requirements such as HIPAA, FHIR, PCI DSS, and SOC 2. Highly skilled in utilizing **Node.js**, **FastAPI**, and **Django** for backend development, as well as **AI/ML** integration using **MLflow**, **Airflow**, and **Kubeflow**.
